resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>72940</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>e462569a-0fa5-11d8-9145-ad0b0c850132#1#13</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A mezopotámiai társadalom</string>
            <string language="en">The society in Mesopothamy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Gesellschaft in Mesopothamy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La société dans Mesopothamy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A sociedade em Mesopothamy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La società in Mesopothamy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κοινωνία σε Mesopothamy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La sociedad en Mesopothamy</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az ókori Mezopotámia társadalma, városai, bíráskodása, társadalmi rétegei valamint a mezopotámiai családok élete</string>
            <string language="en">The society, the cities, the judging, the social layers and the life of the families in Mesopothamy</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">város,  Babilon,  életmód,  Hammurapi,  </string>
            <string language="en">city,  Babylon, way of life,  Hammurapi,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Gesellschaft, die Städte, das Beurteilen, 
die Sozialschichten und das Leben der Familien in Mesopothamy</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La société, les villes, juger, les couches 
sociales et la vie des familles dans Mesopothamy</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A sociedade, as cidades, julgar, as camadas 
sociais e a vida das famílias em Mesopothamy</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La società, le città, giudicare, gli strati 
sociali e la vita delle famiglie in Mesopothamy</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κοινωνία, οι πόλεις, η κρίση, τα κοινωνικά στρώματα
και η ζωή των οικογενειών σε Mesopothamy</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La sociedad, las ciudades, la sentencia, las capas
sociales y la vida de las familias en Mesopothamy</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stadt, Babylon, Lebensart, Hammurapi,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ville, Babylone, façon de vivre, Hammurapi,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cidade, Babylon, maneira de vida, Hammurapi,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">città, Babylon, modo di vivere, Hammurapi,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πόλη, Babylon, τρόπος της ζωής, Hammurapi,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ciudad, Babylon, manera de la vida, Hammurapi,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">14-15</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Panem Kiadó
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>72940</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

  </manifestation>
</expression>
